chicCircle.title: Chic Circle
chicCircle.description: Chic Circle is an innovative mobile application that blends technology and creativity to elevate your fashion experience. Available on both iOS and Android, this app allows users to shop, style, and showcase their wardrobes powered by AI.

features.title: Shop or Sell
features.content: As a seller, showcase and sell clothes and trendy assembles directly through the app. As a client, browse a marketplace filled with trending clothes and assembles tailored to your preferences.

features.title: AI-Powered Closet
features.content: Upload clothes to your virtual closet, and our AI, powered by Gemini, automatically identifies: Type of clothing, Mood, Occasions, Weather compatibility.

features.title: Personalized Outfit Suggestions
features.content: Based on your mood, weather, and upcoming occasions, Chic Circleâ€™s AI generates trendy, personalized outfits using items from your closet.

features.title: Outfit Analysis with Camera
features.content: Snap a photo of your outfit using your deviceâ€™s camera, and our AI will analyze it. Receive recommendations to enhance your outfit based on the current weather and temperature in your location.

features.title: Push Notifications
features.content: When a client purchases an item, the seller will receive a notification with: The client's name, The item's name, The proposed price.

CareWise.title: Care Wise
CareWise.description: CareWise is a complementary mobile application to StepWise, designed for parents and administrators to monitor, support, and highlight the development of children with Down syndrome. It provides a comprehensive view of their progress, facilitates communication between parents, and automates access to inclusive professional opportunities.

RobotWise.title: Robot Wise
RobotWise.description: Robot Wise is An immersive tablet application that enables children with Down syndrome to interact in real time with a physical robot, JetRacer.

features.title: Remote Robot Control
features.content: Children can control the JetRacer robot remotely through the application.

features.title: Live Drawing Activity
features.content: Freehand drawing activity that is validated in real-time by an AI agent using LiveKit, supporting the improvement of children's motor skills

features.title: AI-Generated Storytelling
features.content: Stories are generated using Gemini 2.0 Flash (text + adapted images), streamed using chunked API, and narrated with Speechify.

features.title: Explore Mode
features.content: Children can guide the robot to explore real-world objects, enhancing discovery and engagement.

features.title: Progress Synchronization
features.content: Child's progress and detected talents are synchronized with the global StepWise ecosystem.
